emailField.coffee

¶

emailField

given string as name and optional string as value and object as hash of html attributes then return an html input type password tag

 
module.exports = (name, value, attributes) ->
  if typeof name is 'object'
    attributes = name
    name = null
  else if typeof value is 'object'
    attributes = value
    value = null

  attributes = {} unless attributes?
  attributes.name = name if name?
  attributes.value = value if value?
  attributes.type = 'email'

  labelAttributes = {}
  labelAttributes.for = attributes.id if attributes.id?

  label labelAttributes, name if name?
  input attributes
